body_html: The main reason of the slowdown is that now when we index a 1d tensor we return a scalar, and not a python number. But creating a Tensor struct with a single element brings an additional overhead, because we need to allocate a bunch of things (like sizes, strides, etc).
body_text: The main reason of the slowdown is that now when we index a 1d tensor we return a scalar, and not a python number. But creating a Tensor struct with a single element brings an additional overhead, because we need to allocate a bunch of things (like sizes, strides, etc).
body: The main reason of the slowdown is that now when we index a 1d tensor we return a scalar, and not a python number. But creating a Tensor struct with a single element brings an additional overhead, because we need to allocate a bunch of things (like sizes, strides, etc).
